sourcesContent:
// src/components/PrivacyPolicy.js import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./PrivacyPolicy.css"; const PrivacyPolicy = () => { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(true); const navigate = useNavigate(); const toggleTheme = () => { const newMode = !isDarkMode; setIsDarkMode(newMode); localStorage.setItem("theme", newMode ? "dark" : "light"); if (newMode) { document.body.classList.add("dark"); } else { document.body.classList.remove("dark"); } }; React.useEffect(() => { const saved = localStorage.getItem("theme"); if (saved === "dark" || !saved) { setIsDarkMode(true); document.body.classList.add("dark"); } else { setIsDarkMode(false); document.body.classList.remove("dark"); } }, []); return (
{/* Background Elements */}

))}
{/* Theme Toggle */} {/* Enhanced Navbar */}
Marketing Bot
Home Privacy Policy Contact Us
{/* Main Content */}

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2024

üìã Introduction

Welcome to Marketing Bot ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered social media automation platform.

üîç Information We Collect

Personal Information

  • Name and contact details
  • Email address
  • Professional information
  • Social media account credentials (securely encrypted)

Usage Data

  • Platform interaction data
  • Content generation patterns
  • Performance metrics
  • Technical logs and analytics

üéØ How We Use Your Information

ü§ñ

AI Content Generation

To create personalized content using our advanced AI algorithms

üìä

Platform Optimization

To improve our services and user experience

üîí

Security & Protection

To protect against fraud and unauthorized access

üí¨

Customer Support

To provide timely assistance and resolve issues

üîó Data Sharing & Disclosure

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

  • With your explicit consent
  • To comply with legal obligations
  • To protect our rights and safety
  • With service providers who assist our operations (under strict confidentiality)

üõ°Ô∏è Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

üîê End-to-end encryption
üõ°Ô∏è Regular security audits
üìù Access controls and authentication
üîç Continuous monitoring

üåç Data Retention

We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

üìù Your Rights

You have the right to:

Access

Request copies of your personal data

Rectification

Correct inaccurate information

Erasure

Request deletion of your data

Portability

Transfer your data to another service

üç™ Cookies & Tracking

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

üìû Contact Information

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

Email: craftingbrain@gmail.com

Company: Inikola Technologies

üîÑ Policy Updates

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

By using Marketing Bot, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

{/* Footer */}

Marketing Bot

AI-Powered Social Media Automation

Built by Inikola √ó CraftingBrain
